name: tm38
effect: Teaches Fire Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fire Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A powerful fire
attack that may
burn the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A powerful fire
attack that may
burn the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
an intense flame.
It may leave the
target with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

blast of all-consuming fire. It may
also leave the target with a burn.
